name: Vudu-collection-extensions
body:
# ### Welcome to the Vudu-Collection-Extensions App.
This a build off the FMBB Vudu-Collection heroku app. It is Based off the code created by FattyMoBookyButt for his Vudu-Collection app but with some Stylesheet Edits and Additional Responces for the vudu api.

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.

### This Creates Your own Personal-Vudu-Movie-Library
Currently it only retrieves your Movie info but I am working on adding an extra app that fetches only your tv info. If it wasn't for Fatty and his Heroku app this app would not be possible so I would like to thank him for taking the time to create his app.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
